cyclone.name: CINDY
cyclone.current_location: about 305 mi SSW of the mouth of the Mississippi River and 345 mi SSE of Morgan City, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: Tracking northwest toward the Louisiana Gulf Coast, then forecast to turn north and move inland over Louisiana and into the mid-Mississippi Valley

weather_observation.watch_coast: West of Cameron, LA to High Island, TX (Tropical Storm Watch)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Cameron, LA to Mouth of the Pearl River, MS (Tropical Storm Warning)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Central Texas coast eastward to the western Florida Panhandle
weather_observation.expected_closest_date_to_port: None – system not forecast to approach the Great Lakes
weather_observation.expected_leaving_port_date: None – system influence not expected at the port
weather_observation.rainfall: No significant rainfall expected at Detroit-Wayne County Port from this system
